name: Authkey
description: Authkey.io is an Omni-channel CPaaS (Communication Platform as a Service) provider offering WhatsApp API, SMS, RCS, Email, and Voice solutions to help businesses automate and enhance customer communication. With features like bulk campaigns, fallback mechanisms, chatbot automation, and seamless CRM integrations, Authkey.io ensures high deliverability and engagement across multiple channels. Whether you need to send transactional alerts, promotional messages, or interactive voice and email campaigns, our platform provides a reliable and scalable solution for businesses of all sizes.
focus_areas: WhatsApp Business API features Chatbots, Multiple Agent, Built-in CRM, Click to WhatsApp Ads, Website Widgets and more
SMS Business API features Bulk SMS campaign, OTPs, 2fa, Transactional and promotional messages.
RCS with SMS fallback, parallel message sending, Email APIs, Voice and IVR APIs.
